ItemDesc: Upon use, immediately heals one ally by <unbreak>40%</unbreak> of their Max HP plus <unbreak>320</unbreak> HP.
ItemBGDesc: The lengthy meeting reaches an intermission, and you step out to the atrium, finding solace on a bench and releasing a long breath. The sinking sun, accompanied by an evening breeze, brings the sweetness of nature, boldly combatting against the man-made stainless steel behemoth behind you. A stray cat stretches and jumps onto your lap.\n\n"At least, at this moment, I belong to myself."
